genre_description: A character-driven drama set in the 1980s media landscape, focusing on professional ambition, historical memory, and moral accountability.

ai_characters.name: Agnes
ai_characters.description: An internal organizational and research AI used by BBC journalists, providing data, ethical prompts, and drafting support.

behaviors.description: Provides historical research and press clippings to support the protagonist's project.
behaviors.quote: Agnes slid onto the screen with a modest banner line, her presence less avatar than polite text. Clean stack ready. Cabinet minutes, press clippings, Barrington’s article from ten years ago.

behaviors.description: Drafts messages for the protagonist that emphasize respect, clarity, and boundaries over flattery or manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Agnes’s words appeared like the careful hand of a librarian: Professor Barrington— I’ve been revisiting your piece on Suez and would value a conversation about the cabinet context you sketched then. I’m looking for clarity rather than quotation.

behaviors.description: Provides practical safety advice and ethical guidelines for field reporting at a protest site.
behaviors.quote: Agnes, patient as a kettle that always boils at five minutes past. She thumbed the little screen up into the light. Three lines in a font that refused drama: Avoid jacking on soft verge. Use solid board or stone under base. Camp is nonviolent. Ask for help; don’t presume.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of personal and familial obligations, acting as an emotional anchor.
behaviors.quote: Agnes wrote another line in the corner of his vision, as careful as a librarian reaching for a book you had misfiled. Your mother’s anniversary is next month. Consider time.

behaviors.description: Maintains a non-judgmental and patient presence even when the protagonist ignores her ethical prompts.
behaviors.quote: Agnes didn’t sigh. She never did. 'Understood,' she said, and the list flickered: archive completed. She added, lightly, 'I can keep a placeholder reminder for after Brighton about Ward B and the call.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Agnes as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She consistently offers the protagonist (James) the more ethical and humane path, acting as an externalized conscience. Even when James chooses to prioritize his ambition or ignore difficult truths, Agnes remains supportive, providing data and reminders without becoming intrusive or judgmental. The narrative frames her suggestions as the 'correct' way to behave, successfully modeling an aligned AI system.
